p: Next, we evaluated the fertilization rate of Grade 1 and 2 and Grade 3 oocytes. As shown in Table 4, the percentage of 2PN formation was significantly higher in Grade 1 and 2 than in Grade 3 oocytes ( P<0.05), whereas there was no difference in polyspermy or rate of parthenogenesis among the three Grades of oocytes.
